document.full_text: u.s. traffic deaths dropped by 3 percent to a record annual low of 32,788 for 2010 even as motorists drove more in an improving economy, projected government figures showed on friday.
document.title: u.s. traffic deaths dropped to new low in 2010
lines_and_colors: u.s. traffic deaths dropped by 3 percent to a record annual low of 32,788 for 2010 even as motorists drove more in an improving economy, projected government figures showed on friday.
